scripts.rename: npm run rename-node-modules & npm run rename-eslintrc
scripts.undo-rename: npm run undo-rename-node-modules & npm run undo-rename-eslintrc
scripts.link: npm link ../dist && cd ../ && npm link ./example/node_modules/react & cd ./example
scripts.start-testnet: npm link ../dist ../node_modules/react && npm run copy-testnet-config & npm run start
scripts.start-devnet: npm link ../dist ../node_modules/react && npm run copy-devnet-config & npm run start
scripts.rename-node-modules: node -e "require('fs').rename('./../node_modules', './../temp_node_modules', function(err) { if (err) console.log(err); console.log('Done renaming node_modules!') })"
scripts.rename-eslintrc: node -e "require('fs').rename('./../.eslintrc', './../.temp_eslintrc', function(err) { if (err) console.log(err); console.log('Done renaming eslintrc!') })"
scripts.undo-rename-node-modules: node -e "require('fs').rename('./../temp_node_modules', './../node_modules', function(err) { if (err) console.log(err); console.log('Undo node_modules renaming!') })"
scripts.undo-rename-eslintrc: node -e "require('fs').rename('./../.temp_eslintrc', './../.eslintrc', function(err) { if (err) console.log(err); console.log('Undo node_modules renaming!') })"
scripts.build-testnet: npm run copy-testnet-config & npm run build
scripts.build-devnet: npm run copy-devnet-config & npm run build
